body.scriptCode: var url = do_camera.do_camera_new_photo.TemporaryPublicPhotoURL; var filename = do_camera.do_camera_new_photo.OccurredAt; google_drive.upload_file_from_url_google_drive.setUrl(url); google_drive.upload_file_from_url_google_drive.setFilename(filename); google_drive.upload_file_from_url_google_drive.setPath('Google Drive Camera');
